text: Rochelle Sharpe is an American journalist. She won a 1991 Pulitzer Prize for National Reporting. Her work has appeared in the New York Times, NPR, Politico. She was an adjunct professor at Boston University. == References == == Other websites == * About - Stories That Have Impact Category:Living people Category:American journalists Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:Boston University faculty
title: Rochelle Sharpe
